Package worlds.gregs.hestia.game.plugins.movement.systems

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MobileSystem
    MobileSystem Handles entities which are mobile TODO this could run on delta's so it only processes when position has changed
    MoveSystem
    MoveSystem Instantly moves player to class Position Aka teleporting without delay & animations
    PositionShiftSystem  
    RunSystem
    RunSystem Processes entity run steps Entity must have class RunToggled toggled
    WalkSystem
    WalkSystem Processes entity walk steps
